ing: 2 fresh green chile peppers, or to taste
1 tablespoon white sugar, or more to taste
des: "This is a very versatile chutney and can be used in many ways. I love mixing this chutney with butter and spreading it on bread for sandwiches. I also add some to my omelets."
ins: Combine the mint leaves, green chile peppers, lime juice, sugar, and salt in a food processor and grind into a fine paste. You might need to add some water to help grind all the leaves. Taste test and adjust amounts of salt and sugar to your liking.
